sen.e: In March, 1259, he was assigned to the head priest of the Tendai sect of Buddhism, and after that, he was assigned to the head priest of the Tendai sect of Buddhism for the following four times: from March 1259 to August 1263; from July 1267 to December 1268; from September 1284 to November 1286; from February to October 1290.
